# Medical Practice Management System - Wiki

Welcome to the Medical Practice Management System documentation. This wiki provides comprehensive information about the project, its features, architecture, and development guidelines.

## üè• Project Overview

A comprehensive patient management system built for medical practices to manage patient records, appointments, and medical notes efficiently.

## üìö Documentation Sections

- [Patient Management](Patient-Management) - CRUD operations for patient records
- [Dashboard](Dashboard) - Overview of the dashboard interface
- [Search & Filter](Search-Filter) - Advanced search and filtering capabilities
- [Authentication](Authentication) - User login and session management

### Technical Documentation

### Troubleshooting
